content.question: The comparison to a “bee” in line 23 most clearly serves to emphasize the

choices.label: obliviousness of infatuated people to negative influences in their surroundings
persistence of spurned lovers in hunting for new objects for their affections
optimism of young people in seeking romance in unpromising settings
restlessness of parted lovers in coping with a temporary but long separation

content.answer: persistence of spurned lovers in hunting for new objects for their affections

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
